SQL.LOAD: SELECT role_permission_id, role_id, permission_id, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by FROM elp_role_permission WHERE role_permission_id = :role_permission_id
SQL.LOAD_LIST: SELECT role_permission_id, role_id, permission_id, created_date, created_by, modified_date, modified_by FROM elp_role_permission WHERE role_id = :role_id
SQL.UPDATE: update elp_role_permission set role_id = :role_id, permission_id = :permission_id, modified_date = :modified_date, modified_by = :modified_by where role_permission_id = :role_permission_id
SQL.INSERT: INSERT INTO elp_role_permission ( role_permission_id, role_id, permission_id, created_date, created_by ) VALUES ( :role_permission_id, :role_id, :permission_id, :created_date, :created_by )
